summary: Defines a FastAPI router that exposes endpoints for managing AI evaluation jobs, including creating, deleting, listing, and retrieving evaluation details, scenarios, results, and status, as well as providing a sample webhook handler. The router coordinates with database services, evaluation services, and background tasks to orchestrate evaluation workflows.
business_intent: Enable external clients to programmatically control and monitor AI model evaluations through a RESTful API, supporting creation, monitoring, result retrieval, and webhook integration for automated workflows.
